name: Descent (SMA Games)
description:
After the corporate mining company moved on, scavengers set upon an asteroid to strip it clean, but they left a man behind. You and Cassie have been hired to rescue him, two days before the asteroid is set to be destroyed. Can you find him and make it back out again in time in spite of your new partner?

A Game for the 2015 WAG Challenge by Stephanie Allen

Created using Twine

Cover art by Ben Rollman

http://robotportrait.blogspot.com/
